Introduction: \nGrab this great opportunity to test your soft Skills in the virtual GD simulation. Strengthen your weaker points and make yourself placement ready!
\nNumber of Participant(s): 5 (per round ; depends upon no of entries)
\nTime Alloted: 2 mins + 5 mins per round
\nThe topic for the GD will be disclosed on the spot. •\n The first 2 mins are meant for exploring the topic and quoting points on the paper provided.
• Next the GD session begins which will take place after within the mentioned time limit.
\nParticipants will be judged on various parameters such as : 1. Interactive skills
2. Leadership skills
3. Flexibility
4. Creativity
5. Initiation
6. Awareness
7. Confidence
\nEVENT STRUCTURE- • Participant/s will be selected for the final round which will be held on stage and will be witnessed live on social media on Metacog’s Fb page.
• This activity would fullfil as a virtual GD round as practiced in an actual GD and will help students gain confidence before sitting in an real one.
• The decision of judge would be final and binding .At any time the rules may be changed with the discretion of event Coordinator.
• Use of cell phones, laptops or any other e-device resulting into unfairful means would result into permanent derbar from Event.
